node.title: 'Not unusual it never gets seen again': Boat missing in Tasmania may not be found, says expert
node.alt: A split image of a bearded man wearing round black sunglasses and a yellow and white boat.
node.description: The body of missing Tasmanian man Thomas Courto and the boat he was travelling in are still missing. So how does a boat just vanish in Bass Strait without a trace?
node.content:
["The body of missing Tasmanian man Thomas Courto and the boat he and two other friends were travelling in are\u00a0still missing after more than two weeks.", "But how does a boat just vanish in Bass Strait without a trace?", "Senior lecturer in oceans at the Institute of Marine and Antarctic Studies\u00a0Dr Stuart Corney said it was\u00a0like looking for a \"needle in a haystack\".", "\"I'm not surprised that the boat can disappear,\" he said.", "Mr Courto and his two friends \u2014\u00a0Bree-Anna Thomas and Isaiah Dixon \u2014\u00a0failed to return from a day trip on the water in the north-west on October 18.", "The bodies of Ms Thomas and Mr Dixon were found, washed ashore, near Table Cape two days later.", "On Saturday, the 11-day search for Mr Courto's body and the boat was called off after a \"comprehensive independent review\".", "Dr Corney believes the boat took on water and sank.", "", "
Thomas Courto, Bree-Anna Thomas and\u00a0Isaiah Dixon were good friends.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "\"You certainly hope that the boat is floating and the people are fine, so you assume it moves with the wind \u2014 but it turns out it had probably taken on water,\" Dr Corney\u00a0said.", "\"It would have been moving with the current, potentially in the other direction, and all of a sudden it's 60 kilometres away from where you were targeting your search.", "\"Those currents can be around that 2-kilometres-an-hour speed.\"", "Dr Corney\u00a0said that would make the search for the boat difficult.", "\"After a few days, the search radius is so great that it is very hard to find,\" he added.", "Dr Corney is\u00a0holding out hope\u00a0the boat will be found, but\u00a0that could be months away.", "\"In six months' time, that current will switch around and the boat will start moving in a different direction \u2014 so it may wash up or be discovered,\" he said.", "", "
Currents can make searching\u00a0for the boat difficult.(Supplied: Tasmania Police)
", "
Vessel could be wedged on the ocean floor, expert says
", "Waratah-Wynyard Mayor Robby Walsh said he\u00a0was surprised the boat or any debris had not been found.", "\"It's just an absolute mystery that nothing's been located at this stage,\" he said.", "He\u00a0raised the possibility of the body and vessel being stuck under subsea shelves near the coastline.", "", "
Police divers used sonar technology in the search for Thomas Courto.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "\"It may be where the vessel's\u00a0trapped, who knows,\" he said.", "\"We wonder if it might have hit a whale, or something like that, we just don't know how the accident happened.", "\"While\u00a0it's a terrible tragedy, we just need something to be found in regard to the vessel to give some closure.\"", "Dr Corney said there was a possibility the vessel was wedged on the ocean floor.", "\"There are likely to be geographical features in that area\u00a0and, if the boat is underwater and has sunk, and it's being slowly moved by the current, then it gets to a shelf like that, and it could well just be sitting there pushed up against it,\" he said.", "
Friends, family haven't given up hope
", "North-west commercial fisherman Pete Smith, who has been based at Wynyard for the past 27 years, said he was \"surprised\" the boat hadn't come to the shore yet.", "\"It's just the ocean.\u00a0Some things happen real quick and then sometimes, for some reason, it takes longer,\" he said.", "\"But I am surprised that there hasn't been something of the boat come to the shore at this stage.", "Mr Smith said he was\u00a0not aware of any ocean shelves the boat could be stuck under in the area.", "\"Around Table Cape the rock formation doesn't go out very far at all, so you can virtually throw a stone off the rocks and it's sandy bottom,\" he said.", "", "
Flowers and notes have been left for the victims at a Wynyard park.(Supplied: Annie Matthews)
", "\"There's a few bits of reef in the area\u00a0but, predominantly, once you get out of\u00a0Table Cape, there isn't anything out there for quite a while.\"", "The sea search\u00a0has\u00a0been one\u00a0of the biggest to have taken place on the north-west coast, and also the first time Tasmania Police had used the type of sonar technology employed to search the seabed.", "However, Mr Walsh said\u00a0locals were\u00a0still searching the area.", "\"Friends and family haven't given up hope of finding something that will give some completion to the ordeal,\" he said."]
